intro: Enantiotrichum, commonly known as the ghost orchid, is a rare and enigmatic plant belonging to the Orchidaceae family. The plant is epiphytic, meaning it grows on the surface of trees without deriving nutrients from them. Its roots are adapted to absorb moisture and nutrients from the air and rain.
